definition: To unintentionally make a mistake or error while performing an action or carrying out a task. This term is commonly used to describe an accidental oversight or a slip-up that occurs due to carelessness or lack of attention.

examples.german: Er hat sich versehen und den falschen Zug genommen.
examples.english: He made a mistake and took the wrong train.

examples.german: Sie hat sich beim Schreiben des Briefes versehen und den Namen falsch geschrieben.
examples.english: She made a mistake while writing the letter and spelled the name wrong.

examples.german: Versehentlich habe ich das falsche Buch mitgenommen.
examples.english: Accidentally, I took the wrong book.
